text: 23|14|Sipas nutfaro [Ba sakli] xuni ʙasta soxtem va on goh xuni ʙastaro [ʙa surati] poraguste soxtem, sipas poragustro [ʙa sakli] ustuxon darovardem va on goh ʙar ustuxonho gust pusonidem. Sipas on [canin]-ro ofarinise digar ʙaxsidem. Pas, [purʙarakatu] ʙuzurgvor ast Alloh taolo, ki nakutarin ofarinanda ast
